EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for sending mail for MSPAvionics Transfer reminders
EmailTemplate.name: Aero MSPAvionics Transfer Reminders
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required: MSP Avionics/Mechanical Components Transfer due soon.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
This is a friendly reminder that we have not heard back from you in regards to the transfer of MSP Contract 4400XXXXX which expires XX/XX/20XX.
There is still time for you to complete the transfer process which is FREE and gives you the opportunity to extend the coverage of your aircraft.
*Important note: The transfer process needs to be completed within 30 days of the date of the initial notification otherwise the contract will be terminated.
Thank you for doing business with us, your case tracking number for this renewal is provided above. You may reply to this email - please leave the reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Thank you for doing business with us.
Kind regards,
MSP Avionics & Mechanical Components Contract Administration __________________Q Honeywell
